quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
author: Helen Keller

quote: The older you get, the better you get unless you are a banana.
author: Betty White

quote: You are only young once, but you can stay immature indefinitely.
author: Ogden Nash

quote: The secret of staying young is to live honestly, eat slowly, and lie about your age.
author: Lucille Ball

quote: To move, to breathe, to fly, to floatâ€¦ To travel is to live.
author: Hans Christian Andersen

quote: Tell me, what is it you plan to do with your one wild and precious life
author: Mary Oliver
